pr_title: docs: Adds documentation for IN operator (#6539)

timeline.message:
docs: Adds documentation for IN operator (#6539)

* docs: Adds documentation for IN operator

timeline.author: JimGalasyn
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -146,4 +146,5 @@ The following table shows all operators in the language.
 | `AND`        | logical AND                    | boolean
 | `OR`         | logical OR                     | boolean
 | `BETWEEN`    | test if value within range     | numeric, string
-| `LIKE`       | match a pattern                | string
\ No newline at end of file
+| `LIKE`       | match a pattern                | string
+| `IN`         | short hand for multiple `OR` expressions | all

replies.bodyText: I don't want to get this out of sync with master, since this is a cherry pick.  Is short hand too informal sounding?
replies.author: AlanConfluent

replies.bodyText: Just a personal preference, it's fine as-as!
replies.author: JimGalasyn
